    Lhuqita Fazry

    Founder of Rumah Coding and computer science researcher specializing in computer vision, deep learning, and generative AI, with a focus on applied research and tech education in Indonesia.

    projects

    publications

    Hierarchical Vision Transformers for Cardiac Ejection Fraction Estimation

    Published in 7th International Workshop on Big Data and Information Security (IWBIS)., 2022

    Our hierarchical vision Transformer method directly estimates left ventricular ejection fraction from echocardiogram videos without requiring segmentation, achieving superior performance (MAE: 5.59, RMSE: 7.59, R²: 0.59) compared to state-of-the-art approaches on the EchoNet-Dynamic dataset.

    Recommended citation: L. Fazry et al., "Hierarchical Vision Transformers for Cardiac Ejection Fraction Estimation," 2022 7th International Workshop on Big Data and Information Security (IWBIS), Depok, Indonesia, 2022, pp. 39-44, doi: 10.1109/IWBIS56557.2022.9924664.
    Download Paper

    Change Detection of High-Resolution Remote Sensing Images Through Adaptive Focal Modulation on Hierarchical Feature Maps

    Published in IEEE Access, 2023

    FocalCD introduces an efficient focal modulation-based change detection method that outperforms CNN and Transformer approaches by capturing multi-scale interactions with lower computational complexity, achieving state-of-the-art results on major CD datasets.

    Recommended citation: L. Fazry, M. M. L. Ramadhan and W. Jatmiko, "Change Detection of High-Resolution Remote Sensing Images Through Adaptive Focal Modulation on Hierarchical Feature Maps," in IEEE Access, vol. 11, pp. 69072-69090, 2023, doi: 10.1109/ACCESS.2023.3292531
    Download Paper

    Improving Remote Sensing Change Detection Via Locality Induction on Feed-forward Vision Transformer

    Published in Jurnal Ilmu Komputer dan Informasi (JIKI), 2024

    LocalCD enhances change detection in remote sensing by integrating locality mechanisms into Vision Transformers through depth-wise convolutions, achieving superior F1-scores of 0.9548 (CDD) and 0.9243 (LEVIR-CD) while reducing segmentation artifacts.

    Recommended citation: L. Fazry, Mgs M Luthfi Ramadhan, and W. Jatmiko, “Improving Remote Sensing Change Detection Via Locality Induction on Feed-forward Vision Transformer”, Jurnal Ilmu Komputer dan Informasi, vol. 17, no. 1, pp. 37–48, Feb. 2024.
    Download Paper

    talks

    Workshop: License Plate Recognition with OCR

    Published: July 04, 2024

    Developed OCR-based license plate recognition using Tesseract. This workshop was held for participants of Rumah Coding, Depok.

    Generative AI for Software Development

    Published: August 05, 2024

    Built a chatbot using fine-tuned LLMs (Gemma, LLaMA) on domain-specific data especially for software development. This training was held for employees of Ministry of Finance of the Republic of Indonesia, Jakarta. The training was conducted for 3 days.

    Guest Lecturer: Practical Data Science

    Published: August 05, 2024

    Demonstrated license plate recognition using OpenCV and YOLO. This talk is held for final grade student of SMK Kesuma Bangsa 2 (High Vocational School) Jakarta.

    Single Page Application using Vue.js and Golang

    Published: August 12, 2024

    Developed a single-page application using Vue.js and Golang. This training was held for employees of PT. Modern Polaris Teknologi, Jakarta. The training was conducted for 4 days.

    Workshop: Data Visualization with Seaborn

    Published: August 15, 2024

    Explored data visualization techniques using the Seaborn library. This workshop was held for participants of Rumah Coding, Depok.

    Workshop: Fine-tuning Open Source LLMs with QLoRA

    Published: September 08, 2024

    Fine-tuned LLMs using QLoRA to build domain-specific chatbots. This workshop was held for participants of Rumah Coding, Depok.

    Full-stack Web Laravel

    Published: October 10, 2024

    Delivered training on Laravel framework for web CRUD apps. This training was held for employees of RSUD Cengkareng (regional public hospital), Jakarta. The training was conducted for 4 days.

    Workshop: Reverse Image Search

    Published: October 22, 2024

    Implemented image similarity search using YOLO and Milvus. This workshop was held for participants of Rumah Coding, Depok.

    Speaker: Vector Embedding Index

    Published: October 22, 2024

    Presented fundamentals of similarity search using vector embeddings. This talk was held for employees of DJPP (Direktorat Jenderal Peraturan Perundangan) – Ministry of Law and Human Rights of the Republic of Indonesia, Jakarta.

    Guest Lecturer: Deep Neural Networks

    Published: November 12, 2024

    Provided an introduction to neural networks and deep learning. This talk was held for students of Universitas Gunadarma, Depok.

    API Development with Go & Echo

    Published: November 15, 2024

    Developed RESTful APIs using Go and Echo framework. This training was held for employees of Direktorat Jenderal Kekayaan Negara (DJKN), Ministry of Finance of the Republic of Indonesia. The training was conducted for 3 days.

    Workshop: Face Verification with ArcFace

    Published: November 20, 2024

    Built a face verification system using ArcFace. This workshop was held for participants of Rumah Coding, Depok.

    Intermediate Data Science

    Published: December 11, 2024

    Taught data scraping, preprocessing, visualization, and ML modeling with Python. This training was held for employees of PT. Pertamina Hulu Rokan, Jakarta. The training was conducted for 3 days.

    Speaker: Mobile App Development with Flutter

    Published: December 12, 2024

    Delivered session on building CRUD mobile apps and developing APIs with Node.js. This talk was held for students of Politeknik Harapan Bersama, Tegal, Central Java.

    Generative AI (LLM)

    Published: January 05, 2025

    Created a chatbot using open-source LLMs (e.g. Gemma, LLaMA) with custom datasets. This training was held for IT team of UBS Surabaya, Surabaya, East Java. The training was conducted for 4 days.

    Deep Learning

    Published: February 01, 2025

    Trained participants to build deep learning model for regression and classification tasks using Tensorflow. This training was held for IT team of PT. Astra Otoparts Winteq, Karawang, West Java. The training was conducted for 4 days.

    Full-stack Web Laravel

    Published: March 01, 2025

    Built a CRUD-based full-stack web application using Laravel and MySQL for IT team of PT. Subang Autocomp Indonesia. The training was conducted for 4 days.

    Flutter Mobile Development

    Published: March 10, 2025

    Developed a basic mobile app with CRUD functionality for Android/iOS using Flutter mobile framework. This training was held for teachers of SMKN 8 Jakarta (Vocational High School). The training was conducted for 4 days.
